attributes.title: horrible🤮

attributes.review:
Please don’t get me wrong!! I was raised as a Trump supporter, and I’ve raised my children as Trump supporters. I voted for Trump in the last election and will vote for him again!! I think he is doing a fabulous job as president. However, I think we should find other ways to support him. I downloaded this app so I could stay updated. However, the app proved to be VERY glitchy. For one, it takes up SO MUCH STORAGE SPACE!!!! And it doesn’t even function properly. I tried to open it up and it just kept crashing. If you’re going to make a storage consuming app, at least make it work right!!!!! Eventually it started crashing less, and I could actually open it up. HOWEVER, just when it started working, the WiFi in my house went down for a few days, so I had to use cellular. All of my other apps worked, but NOT THIS ONE. I’m not sure why!! Even my kids couldn’t figure it out. We ended up having to call the company that manages our cellular connection, and they told us that the app was probably broken(if that was even possible??). Well, after more working with the app, my kids and I concluded that it WAS broken. It worked a little better with WiFi, but then it started CRASHING AGAIN!!!!! At first when I read the reviews, I just thought it was a bunch of libtards trying make a mockery of our amazing president. However, after trying to use this app, I now believe that they may just be other trump supporters with the same problem. I would have expected more from the president!!! He might be doing a great job of running our beautiful country, but he sure can’t make an app right!!!! That being said, we can show our devotion to our supreme leader in many other ways!
TRUMP 2020
GOD BLESS THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA!!!!!🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸
attributes.title: HORRIBLE!!!

attributes.review: This app KILLED MY GRANDMOTHER. She was very stupid and loved Donald Trump. ‘Loved,’ she’s DEAD NOW because she was using the app SO MUCH that her phone exploded and killed her.
